structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
FINANCE AND REVENUE OF CITIES OF THE FIRST CLASS

law.catch_line: Affidavits filed with circuit clerk -- Effect.
law.text: Affidavits of publication of notice and of posting, mailing, or other acts required by the provisions of KRS 91.484 to 91.527 shall be filed in the office of the circuit clerk prior to the trial, and when so filed shall constitute part of the evidentiary document in the enforcement suit. The affidavits shall be prima facie evidence of the performance of acts therein described, and may be so used in the trial of the suit unless challenged by verified answer duly filed in the suit.
law.history: Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 47, sec. 5, effective July 15, 1980.
